ygData.msgSnippet: A word of warning: That necro cons red at 42.  I went with a group to try to take it out and we were warned off by some level 50 s we knew who had tried and
ygData.messageBody:
A word of warning:

That necro cons red at 42. I went with a group to try to take it out and we
were warned off by some level 50's we knew who had tried and failed with
around 8 level 50's to kill it.


----- Original Message -----
From: <>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 8:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] More clues from Lindell, third book confirmed,
and more...


> From: Diablokilr@...
>
> Ok guys we obviously need to group up a little bit my highest character is
a

am

to
